+++ SUMMARY
Fixed values that can't be modified during execution of a ComputerProgram. 

can be of any of the basic data types i.e.:
  integer constant
  floating constant
  character constant
  string literal. 
  enumeration constants

treated just like regular variables 
  * except constant values cannot be modified after their definition
